text: Takkha nangnichu innakadang mi ngaikha ning ejei, rengphung sik, inthiang zaatsik, Pathian misik, khat-um nangni ngaikha kaziing makheiya ama katha war khan anakoisuok jarra nangni'n Pathian chuontho loknakha karilthang sik-ah inakadang eii. Suok 19:5-6; Isa 9:2; 43:20,21; Innidan 4:20; 7:6; Tit 2:14
